text: UMvelinqangi wenza iKaâ€™aba indlu engcwele yokuma abantu (ukuze badumise uMvelinqangi) nenyanga engcwele neminikelo yezilwane kanye nezinemiqhele yezimbali lokhu kungukuthi ukuze nazi ukuthi uMvelinqangi uyakwazi konke okusemazulwini nakho konke okusemhlabeni nokuthi uMvelinqangi wazi ngazozonke izinto
